accountLiquidity(MarketsLib.Book storage.details: Function to get account's liquidity for a certain market/maturity pool

params.account: wallet which the liquidity will be calculated
params.book: account book that it will be used to calculate liquidity
params.fixedLenderToSimulate: fixedLender in which we want to simulate withdraw/borrow ops (see next two args)
params.oracle: oracle used to perform all liquidity calculations

addToMarket(MarketsLib.Book storage,addr.details: Allows a user to start participating in a market

params.book: book in which the addMarket function will be applied to
params.fixedLenderAddress: address used to retrieve the market data
params.who: address of the user that it will start participating in a market/maturity

exitMarket(MarketsLib.Book storage,addre.details: Allows wallet to exit certain markets (fixedLenderDAI, fixedLenderETH, etc)      By performing this action, the wallet's money stops being used as collateral

params.book: book in which the addMarket function will be applied to
params.fixedLenderAddress: market address used to retrieve the market data
params.who: wallet that wants to exit a market/maturity

validateBorrow(MarketsLib.Book storage,a.details: Function to validate if a borrow should be allowed based on the what the book says. if the user is not participating in a market, and the caller is a fixedLender, the function will subscribe the wallet to the market membership

params.book: account book that it will be used to perform validation
params.borrower: address which will be borrowing money from this market
params.fixedLenderAddress: address of the market that the borrow will be validated. If this equals msg.sender then the wallet will be autosubscribed to the market membership,
